评论详情: I love Coofandy products and have bought some in the past. Unfortunately, I just placed two separate orders for their long sleeve untuckit shirts and both came to me a different color than was advertised on the website. This made me disappointed since all my previous orders came in correctly to the color exactly as the site presented. I have one more shirt coming in and I hope this one will match the site more correctly. The good news is that the shirts are made very well, colors(when correct to the website) are very contemporary, they fit great to size and are very comfortable. I expect to continue purchasing more merchandise from this supplier.
Like the title says, shirt runs small and is too short.
Had to send two 4XL shirts back. 3XL s fit nicely Truly wrinkle free. Great shirts.
I bought these for my elderly father, but they’re very stylish anybody at any age could wear them. They wash up nice and they remain soft. I would hang dry them because they could shrink.

A good causal shirt for work or going out. It's not exceptional, but is a solid middle-of-the-road choice. Wears well and I have no complaints.

I have several Coofany shirts now for just hanging out, and they are much nicer than you'd expect for the low price ... especially their linen weave shirts -- the wrinkle free shirts are also nice -- wore on a date to a nice restaurant and got complimented on my shirt -- I have a closet full of CK shirts also, and now wonder why I spent so much on them.

This button-down shirt features a denim-textured look, crafted from a comfortable, flexible, and lightweight rayon blend. It’s not actual denim but offers a unique blend of style and comfort.With its regular fit, spread collar, button closure, and adjustable cuffs, this shirt exudes low-key fashion. Whether you’re aiming for a casual or business look, this COOFANDY shirt has you covered. Pair it with jeans and loafers for a laid-back vibe, or tuck it into trousers and leather shoes for a more polished appearance.Wear it to work, weekends, parties, or even beach weddings. This shirt suits multiple occasions and makes a great gift for yourself or a friend.
Good  -looking shirt!  Feels like satin. Light weight.  Take a medium, but ordered a small due to reviews that said the shirts run bigger.  They do! Small fits perfect. Glad I did it!

This shirt is honestly quiet nice, the material is soft and lightweight, the cut is flattering. It looks good when worn. However, the reason for the removal of one star is that it runs large, significantly so. I'd say it's about a size and a half bigger than expected. So long as you're mindful of that when ordering, I think it's easy enough to say it's a solid purchase to make.

评论概述: Soft and light - pay attention to size chart
评论详情: This is a very comfortable shirt, super soft fabric. It went through the washer/dryer cycles fine. No shrinkage or deformation. It is not wrinkle-free. Even using the permanent press setting on the dryer it still required a steam iron to get the wrinkles out. (see picture of shirt hanging for after dryer, before iron) There was a stain on the sleeve of the shirt when I opened the package. It did not come out in the wash. I don't know what it was, but it looks like an ink or wine blotch or something. I am not a fan of this shirt untucked. It doesn't have the side slits I like to see for a shirt that was meant to be untucked. It does look nice tucked in. However, it wasn't meant to be worn with a tie. The collar is not wide enough in the back. The sizing is a little odd. The shoulders are narrower than normal in proportion to the chest. My dress shirts are 44" chest, 20" shoulder, 25.25" sleeve. The advertised sizes for this shirt are: Medium is 44.9" chest, 18.9" shoulder, 25.6" sleeve. Large is 47.9" chest, 19.6" shoulder, 26" sleeve. I ordered large because I was worried about the narrow shoulder measurements. The shoulder on the Large is still less than my other dress shirts, but if I went larger I knew the shirt would be way too big in the other measurements. As it is, the large is very relaxed in the chest and the sleeves are pretty long. I don't know if I should've done with the Medium or not.
The website suggested I buy an XL based on past purchases but a L would have been better.
This shirt is well made, and very lightweight.

I prefer long sleeved shirts. In my wardrobe I didn't have any light blue long sleeved shirts so this Coofandy was a good choice for me.  I ordered my usual size of XL and it fit's perfectly. The shirt is soft, cool and comfortable to wear. The stitching is well done and there is a pocket on the left chest. It comes with an extra button as well. It can worn either tucked in or left out as it has a tail.  Overall it's a very nice shirt. I wouldn't expect anything less from Coofandy as I have many other shirts from them. This makes a great work shirt and can be worn casually.

Ordered this in a medium. My son toggles between a small and a medium but went with this size because of the length. Great fit on him and I absolutely love the color! The material has a good textured which elevates the look of the shirt.

评论概述: Very Nice Shirt For A Hot Summer Day
评论详情: Are the summers getting hotter?  I can't say, I'm not a scientist.  But it's hot right now and very sunny and I've worn this shirt three times since I got at and it  is now my favorite shirt for leaving the house in.  I wish I could wear it to work and I plan to get more.This is a very light weight shirt.  So perfect for the heat.  The variety of colors means you can make this your go to wardrobe choice for the summer, I plan to.  The quality is more or less about the same for a standard Oxford style long sleeve shirt.  I would say you can wear this with a suit or just by itself.  Too bad they don't make one of these that takes cufflinks.The size is accurateThen there is the price.  I have seem shirts at this price in big discount box stores that were not as nice.Overall I highly recommend this shirt.

Love this color! It will look good on me at my sisters wedding this summer. It is dressy, yet causal. I think it fits true to size as I usually wear a XXL and that is what I got with this shirt and it fit fine. Washing and drying were easy and I dont think it wrinkled that bad. Good find.

As with most every Coofandy garment I have ordered, this is a well made product. The shirt fits true to the size information in the listing and the color is relatively accurate to the listing images. The images used seem to just be color altered images and with the navy blue color selected, one of the images is poorly edited and appears as though the model had a serious sweating issue but that is just an image error. The material is light and breathes well and feels comfortable in even the warmest of weather. The construction of the shirt is very well done with no defects found.
Pros: Well made medium weight material,  Cons: Runs larger than sizing chart measurements.

I have purchased a few items from the COOFANDY brand, and they have been surprisingly nice pieces on a consistent basis, so I was confident in ordering this shirt.  It is a nice casual shirt, and it looks good on my handsome husband.  He is 6’1”, 180 pounds, and wears and XL (could wear Large in some items, but prefers how XL fits). This XL is a bit larger than other XL shirts he has from this brand, but not too much.  It can be worn untucked, (it is a little longer for untucked styling, yet still looks good!), and he could tuck it if he wanted, but this was selected for the untucked style.Overall, this is a nice versatile shirt to add to your wardrobe! I hope this is helpful!

This obviously comes folded up, I washed it and honestly expected it to be a shriveled mess but nope almost completely wrinkle free! The shirt itself is a thin breathable material and super comfortable. It doesn't seem to be a slim fit, just a regular fit. I typically prefer a slim fit as I'm a smaller guy, but this is by far one of my most comfortable dress shirts.

评论概述: One of my new favorite shirts
评论详情: I'm enjoying everything about this shirt. I like the blue color, which is close to the color in the product pictures but maybe a bit deeper. The fit is great, and it looks good untucked, which is how I prefer to wear my shirts right now. The fabric is nice and the shirt feels comfortable. Care is straight-forward, although line drying is recommended and I find that frustrating. It also needs to be ironed because it wrinkles easily. Ok, maybe I don't enjoy *everything* about the shirt, but I'd still call it one of my favorites.

评论概述: No complaints, fit's perfectly, looks great, comfortable
评论详情: I'm generally safe with ordering XL without checking the size chart provided; however, while I was waiting for the delivery of this shirt from Coofandy, I checked out some of the previous reviews, most of which claiming that what they ordered was larger than expected. Because I liked the look of the shirt and have enjoyed Coofandy products before, I reluctantly expected mine to be too large as well.  My XL measurements are Chest = 23.5 inches Shoulders = 21.5 inches Length = 33 inches Sleeve = 26.5 inches  Happily, this was not the case. In fact, my shirt fit perfectly in every way; however, it's a little wide, and might be a better fit for a non-thin person. It's made from 100% polyester, so it feels light and breathable, but is also a durable fabric. It's a comfortable and attractive dress shirt that's well-suited for formal settings.
The white shirt was reasonably opaque and was well-made with clean seams and buttonholes. It runs true to size for my husband, and x-LG. The polyester fabric feels cool and is very easy to wash.

I ordered this long sleeve button up shirt from the COOFANDY Store for my husband to wear to church. I have order a few different shirts from this company before for my husband and I have been very happy with everything I have ordered from this store, including this shirt. I ordered it in the color light green. The only problem I have found is that sometimes these shirts are made a little big for their size. My husband is 6’2” and 235lbs. And he normally wears a 2XL and that is what I ordered in this dress shirt and I could have ordered and XL and it would have fit him much better. So, you may want to go down a size. This dress shirt is made out of high quality material and the stitching is on par. This shirt is pretty soft but it is the kind of shirt that I would not use fabric softener on due to the possibility it may stain the fabric. I can say that when it comes out of the dryer it won’t need ironing very much if any at all. I do recommend this dress shirt to others.

COOFANDY's men's long-sleeve button-down shirts offer a blend of style and comfort that's perfect for various occasions. Whether you're heading to a casual outing or a beach wedding, these shirts provide a relaxed yet polished look. The untucked design adds a modern touch, making them effortless to wear with jeans or chinos. The fabric is lightweight and breathable, ideal for warmer days without sacrificing style. Overall, COOFANDY delivers on both quality and aesthetics, making these shirts a solid choice for anyone looking to upgrade their casual wardrobe with a hint of sophistication.

Tested in some warm sink water and it didn't bleed any color out so it's safe to throw in your regular laundry. Nice looking casual dress shirt, is exactly what you'd expect from a dress shirt in material feel. Fitment was correct for my normal size and was plenty roomy wearing it.

Though the material is fair, the sizing was a little off. I appreciate the room to breath, but this one was just a little too big. Wearable overall and does look nice. The price point on this item I would say is a little higher than expected given the material is just ok. Would pass for a casual meeting but not for anything really formal.  Recommended to try.

评论概述: Great Quality Shirt Lightweight and Breathable - Sizing Accurate According to Measurement Chart
评论详情: This Coofandy Men's Long Sleeve Button Down Shirt is a great addition to my wardrobe. The polyester material is light and breathable but not see-through, especially with the navy color I opted for. This makes it ideal to wear alone or with an undershirt, providing versatility for different occasions.  The sizing is accurate according to the provided measurement chart. I always go by the provided measurements rather than the general size classifications (S, M, L, XL), and it fits me exactly as pictured on the model. I appreciate the slightly longer sleeves, which are certainly better than too short, yet not so long that they look awkward on me. I wear this shirt for both business casual settings and nights out on the town. The quality of the sewing, dye, and overall construction is superb.

My teen son is growing like bamboo in the rain. He isn't quite ready for size large men's shirts... yet... so I got this in large for him to grow into.  The sizing is off. Over all it is larger than other larges. My husband also tried it on. It fits him fine across the shoulders but it is tight across the chest and the sleeves are very long.  This review is for COOFANDY Mens Long Sleeve Button Down Shirts Untucked Shirts for Men Casual Dress Shirts Beach Wedding Shirt
Great shirt. Ordered a size too big to be safe but didn’t need to do that. Order your size. Good quality
This certainly feels like a great shirt. While I have not had it long enough to give it a through test, first impressions are good. I like the colour and may end up buying more like it.
Ok
Excellent fit and material quality!

As with all good shirts, it covered my chest, back, and arms as advertised.  On a more serious note, the material was nice, easy to launder, and the coloring wasn't overbearing.  A pink shirt can be a risky fashion choice in some circles, but this wasn't overbearing.  Would purchase this style again.
